John Edwards claims that the Democrats can cure spine injuries and have people like Chris Reeve walking in no time. 
 
 John Kerry claims that Bush is wrong in saying that complete safety from terrorism is "up in the air". Kerry promises to make us totally safe.
 
 Here are just two of the many promises that NOBODY CAN DELIVER!
